title_narrative: Technical Assistance under the South-South Cooperation (SSC) with the People?s Republic of China in Support of the Implementation of the National Agriculture Investment Plan (2016-2020) in the Republic of the Sudan
description_narrative: increasing agricultural productivity in crop and livestock sector, and the capacity of animal health in Sudan through enhancing access to technologies and markets. This SSC project?s results will directly contribute to the implementation of the Sudan?s National Agriculture Investment Plan (2016-2020) and the FAO-Sudan Country Programming Framework (2017-2020).
